summary: Completed frontend testing of PomodoroTrack timer customization features. Successfully verified settings page UI components, timer duration inputs, and sound configuration section. Backend API working perfectly (100% success rate). Main blocker: session management issues preventing complete end-to-end flow testing.

integration_issues.issue: Users get logged out frequently and redirected to login page during navigation
Cannot complete full timer flow due to session management issues

passed_tests: Settings page loads and displays 'Duraci√≥n del Timer' section
Duration inputs are present and editable (pomodoro: 25min, short break: 5min, long break: 15min)
Pomodoros until long break setting is configurable (default: 4)
Sound section ('Sonidos') is present with toggle, selector, and volume controls
Dashboard displays timer with correct default duration (25:00)
Backend API endpoints working perfectly (100% success rate)
Timer settings UI components have proper data-testid attributes
Settings page navigation works when authenticated
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session management issues in frontend authentication. Users are getting logged out during navigation between pages, preventing complete testing of timer functionality and settings persistence. This is blocking full end-to-end testing of the timer customization features.
